name: Super Dasher (SocksNGames)
description:
Play as a Dasher, a dashing blob, and dash thru and kill your clones before they kill you! All in this hectic, fast-paced, bullet-hell, hack-N-slash top-down arcade action survival game!

made in 3 hours 5 mins for the TriJam 206

 

              

Mouse to Move

Dash to kill

Wait for bar to fill to dash

SocksNGames  dev sound art i do pixels and games sometimes, i like TRAINS!

BG Music by Zapsplat.com
